SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.title: How is my invoice calculated?
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.explaination: The amount of your invoice is calculated in the following way:
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc1: Each active member (member associated to a Rolebase account) cost 5 euros per month
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc2: If an active user is added during the month, the amount is prorated between the current date and the end of the billing cycle and will be added to your next invoice
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc3: If an active user is deleted during the month, a credit note for the time spent during the month will be applied to your next invoice

SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.title: Comment ma facture est-elle calcul√©e ?
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.explaination: Le montant de votre facture est calcul√© de la mani√®re suivante :
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc1: Chaque membre actif (membre associ√© √† un compte de base de r√¥le) co√ªte 5 euros par mois.
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc2: Si un utilisateur actif est ajout√© pendant le mois, le montant est calcul√© au prorata entre la date actuelle et la fin du cycle de facturation et sera ajout√©e √† votre prochaine facture.
SubscriptionInvoiceCalculationDetails.desc3: Si un utilisateur actif est supprim√© pendant le mois, une note de cr√©dit pour le temps restant pendant le mois sera appliqu√©e √† votre prochaine facture.
